name: Universal Electronics Inc.
description: Universal Electronics Inc. (UEI) is a global leader in universal control and sensing technologies for the connected home and beyond. Founded in 1986 and headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona, UEI designs and develops innovative products that enhance the smart home experience. The company is recognized for its advanced remote control solutions, including universal remotes, smart home hubs, and audio/video equipment controls. With a focus on integrating various technologies, UEI's products enable seamless interaction between users and their connected devices, including televisions, set-top boxes, smart speakers, and other IoT devices. UEI also provides software solutions for device control and automation, which are critical in the rapidly evolving smart home landscape. The company collaborates with leading brands in the consumer electronics sector, offering customized solutions to enhance user experiences and improve operational efficiencies. As the demand for smart home technology continues to grow, UEI remains committed to innovation, sustainability, and delivering exceptional value to consumers and partners alike.
